author: Project Veritas
description:
Project Veritas exposes a covert network of trans activists in Connecticut, led by Pastor Aaron Miller and Youth Director Tony Ferraiolo. Undercover footage reveals secret support groups, hidden breast binders, and talks of puberty blockers and top surgery for a 12-year-old girl, "Justin," seeking to transition - without parental consent. Watch the shocking investigation now.

title: WITHOUT CONSENT Part 1: Connecticut Pastor, Youth Director, Secretly Push Kids to Gender Transition
